suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'La Montaña-El Cortijo, Aranjuez', 'title': 'Detached house'}
description: Luxury villa with views of the golf course Luxury villa located in the wonderful town of Aranjuez, it has 582 square meters according to the land registry. It is a 3 storey house, 6 bedrooms and 6 bathrooms, all bedrooms are of large size. The largest one could be compared to a large luxury hotel suite.    Top quality construction materials, thick cement walls that insulate from both cold and heat, natural stone cladding, triple glazed tilt and turn windows, all porcelanosa flooring and ceramics, Iroko carpentry, marble stucco walls, underfloor heating, fireplace, whirlpool bath with chromotherapy, designer kitchen with island, premium range of appliances. As we enter through the main door, on the ground floor we find on both sides of the hall two bedrooms, one of them with bathroom and another complete courtesy bathroom, on the right hand side we can access to a fabulous and practical kitchen and access to a room for ironing and washing machine. To the front we find the living room with views from its large window to the garden, the outdoor swimming pool and views of the golf course. On the upper floor we find 2 double bedrooms, each with its own bathroom and at the back the master bedroom in large suite with large bathroom with whirlpool tub, shower with column, double sinks and dressing room of iroko wood, from this room you can also access a terrace with unobstructed views. In the basement there is a service room with a complete bathroom and wardrobe. Gymnasium room with high quality tiled walls and indoor swimming pool with counter-current swimming motor and sauna cabin. The Royal Site and Villa of Aranjuez is located south of the Community of Madrid, from whose capital -Madrid- it is 47 kilometers by road or rail, the same ones that separate it from Toledo. The municipal area is the second largest in the region, covering an area of 19,000 hectares and its average altitude is 490 meters above sea level. The municipality is located in a wide plain formed by the confluence of the Tajo and Jarama rivers. This means that, even though it is inland, Aranjuez enjoys a temperate climate. The strong personality of Aranjuez is defined by its vegetal landscape, large and lush gardens, groves and forests on the banks of the Tagus and Jarama; long groves of trees on the main streets of the town; fertile irrigated orchards in the plains crisscrossed by canals and irrigation ditches since ancient times; Extensive dry lands frame a harmonious complex, wisely ornamented with monuments by the hand of man. It is already cliché, but it is a reality, to say that Aranjuez constitutes an orchard in the middle of the arid plateau. The urban complex of Aranjuez presents two well-differentiated but complementary cities: to the north, the Royal Palace and the Gardens, the monumental area; To the south, the Villa, whose Old Town, with a baroque layout, has been declared a Historical-Artistic Site. Aranjuez with almost 60,000 inhabitants is becoming an emblematic site for new cultural and gastronomic projects and is preparing to be a world reference in the field of Signature cuisine with its MAGIC university, from which Spain's future Michelin stars will come.

description: Discover the epitome of luxury and sophistication in this magnificent independent villa of 428.56 m² built with elevator, it sits on a majestic plot of 602.42 m², built in 2010 and strategically oriented to the southwest and southeast, where quality and detail merge into an architectural masterpiece. The ground floor of 147.69 m² is presented as an extraordinary coexistence space, with a two-room living-dining room that opens to a private terrace and with direct access to the pool.The kitchen, with an island finished in silestone, awakens the senses with unobstructed views and direct access to an additional 20.5 m² terrace.In addition, a versatile office that could be converted into a bedroom and a bathroom complete this level. The first floor of 119.49 m² offers an additional luxurious setting, with a large open space perfect for a storage room or non-living activities.Four bedrooms, one with a private terrace and panoramic views, offer a serene retreat.A full bathroom completes this floor, providing comfort and privacy. The 161.38 m² semi-basement is a sanctuary for versatility, with an additional bathroom and enough space to create a self-contained apartment.The garage with automatic door can accommodate up to four vehicles, providing the comfort and security you deserve. We are looking at a magnificent property, comfortable, independent and with all services nearby, in the sought-after La Montaña Urbanization just 5 minutes from Aranjuez (Madrid). description: Single-family semi-detached houses from 336 m², with 3 bedrooms and a multipurpose room, 3 bathrooms and a toilet, for sale in the municipality of Aranjuez, Madrid.The houses are located in an area of consolidated expansion called Ciudad de las Artes.As for road access routes, the most common due to their use are M-305 and TO-2542.Less than 11 minutes from the train station.These are semi-detached houses developed on 4 floors: basement, low, high and under cover.The basement is used as a private garage with capacity for two cars and a cellar. On the ground floor we find the living-dining room, the kitchen and a toilet.The upper floor consists of 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.On the covered ground floor is space 1 with the possibility of being used for multiple uses, space 2 with the possibility of being used as a bathroom and exit to two terraces. Built on private plots of around 150 m².They have a PANASONIC AQUAREA T-CAP brand aerothermal system that feeds the radiant/refreshing wire circuit and fan coil circuit in bedrooms and living room, as well as a DHW production system.In addition to 4 units of JA SOLAR brand photovoltaic panel with a power of 545W that services the entire electrical installation (including aerothermal installation) with surpluses to the network.The aluminum carpentry is CORTIZO Brand with thermal break and climalit insulating glass.The kitchen is fully furnished with high and low furniture.The appliances included are a CATA brand hood, sink and faucet and a BALAY oven, microwave and induction hob.The bathrooms are equipped with ROCA brand toilets and taps and a walk-in shower finished in natural stone with a perimeter drain and thermostatic taps in the main bathroom.They have an English patio and a terrace on the ground floor with access from the living room, both measuring approximately 21 m² each.It also has two terraces on the ground floor with access from multipurpose room 1.The north terrace has an area of approx.17 m² and the south of approx.22 m² approximately.Individual pool of 2x2 m.In the town we can find services such as supermarkets, restaurants, sports facilities, educational centers, bank offices, other commercial businesses, etc. The graphic information contained in this support is indicative, prepared from the basic project, and is not contractual, so it may be modified by the promoter company during the execution of the works for reasons of a technical, legal and commercial nature.Likewise, the furniture, decoration, setting elements and electrical appliances included are of a decorative nature and are not subject to contracting.

description: Building with two homes built on a 250m2 plot. The ground floor home has a living room, two bedrooms, a full bathroom and a large kitchen with an office with access to the free area of the patio of about 80m2, where there are also several buildings dedicated to storage. The house on the first floor is completely renovated, with a large living room with an American kitchen, 3 bedrooms, a full bathroom and a terrace. The construction has a garage with automatic door.

description: The house is located in one of the best locations in Aranjuez, close to the university and well connected by public transport, close to supermarkets, green areas, parks. The distribution of the property is: - Hallway that will lead to the kitchen, this has a square layout, with a large window and its own clothesline. - Next to the kitchen, the same hall will lead to the living room, which is very spacious and bright and has access to a terrace with an awning. - THREE bedrooms, spacious, built-in wardrobes and bright. Don't miss this opportunity and come see it!

description: This villa is at Avenida de las Artes, 28300, Aranjuez, Madrid, at Ciudad de las Artes. It is a villa, built in 2023, that has 338 m2 of which 310 m2 are useful and has 5 rooms and 3 bathrooms. It has wardrobe, jardín, aire acondicionado, pool, equipped kitchen, building with parking lot, cocina amueblada, exterior, terraze and luminous.
